amendment.description: To impose limitations and requirements for the acquisition of aerial refueling for the Air Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3441 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3441 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To impose limitations and requirements for the acquisition of aerial refueling for the Air Force.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3441 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3441 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
